name: Storyngton Hall
summary: The Green family has moved into a Regency-era mansion in desperate need of renovation! Welcome to Storyngton Hall, a Match 3 home and garden design/renovation game perfect for lovers of romance, exciting tales of lords and ladies, and addictive puzzles and challenges. Solve Match 3 puzzles and help the family renovate, decorate, and design their dream home. Don't forget to take care of the grounds as you surround it with stunning, lush gardens. Unlock new areas to practice your landscaping and interior decoration skills, and invite your friends from Facebook to play together! Unravel the mysteries of Storyngton Hall and its colorful characters: Mrs. Green wishes to be the talk of the town, her daughter Jane dreams of finding true love, and Mr. Green would just like a little relaxation. None will come to pass if the wicked Lady Wroth has anything to say! Are you ready to help make their dreams come true?
